summary: This document is a letter from Deutsche Bank authorizing Darren Indyke to have signing authority and verbal confirmation on accounts related to a financial relationship. It includes contact information and is marked confidential.

persons.name: Darren Indyke
persons.context: Darren Indyke is granted signing authority and verbal confirmation authority on accounts associated with the financial relationship mentioned in the letter.

persons.name: Amanda Kirby
persons.context: Amanda Kirby is the recipient of the letter from Deutsche Bank regarding the authorization for Darren Indyke.

locations: 345 Park Avenue, 27th Fl, New York, NY 10154
keyFacts: The letter authorizes Darren Indyke to have signing authority on accounts.
Amanda Kirby is the contact person at Deutsche Bank for this authorization.
The letter pertains to a financial relationship with Southern Financial.
